trophies.title: Spark Starter
trophies.text: Do not despise these small beginnings, for the Lord rejoices to see the work begin.
trophies.description: Your altar is lit. Even the smallest spark shakes the darkness. Keep it burning.

trophies.title: Kindled Flame
trophies.text: The fire must be kept burning on the altar continuously; it must not go out.
trophies.description: You’ve made prayer a rhythm. This flame is alive — don't let it die.

trophies.title: Burning Ember
trophies.text: May my prayer be set before you like incense.
trophies.description: Your altar carries fragrance before Heaven. Your consistency is holy.

trophies.title: Flickering Torch
trophies.text: A sword for the Lord and for Gideon!
trophies.description: Your light confuses the enemy. You're becoming dangerous to darkness.

trophies.title: Lit Lamp
trophies.text: You are the light of the world. A city set on a hill cannot be hidden.
trophies.description: You’re shining publicly. Your altar is now a beacon.

trophies.title: Flame Carrier
trophies.text: Arise, shine, for your light has come.
trophies.description: You're carrying fire into dark places. Heaven’s glory rests on you.

trophies.title: Minister of Fire
trophies.text: He makes His ministers flames of fire.
trophies.description: You’re no longer just praying — you’re becoming the prayer.

trophies.title: Golden Bowl Filler
trophies.text: Golden bowls full of incense, which are the prayers of God’s people.
trophies.description: Your prayers echo in eternity. The bowls are filling because of your faithfulness.

trophies.title: Altar Builder
trophies.text: Elijah repaired the altar of the Lord.
trophies.description: You are restoring sacred spaces in your life. You're a rebuilder.

trophies.title: Consuming Fire
trophies.text: Our God is a consuming fire.
trophies.description: You’ve become what you behold. Your life is no longer lukewarm.

trophies.title: Breaker Flame
trophies.text: The One who breaks open will go before them.
trophies.description: Your altar breaks things open. Chains, atmospheres, and hearts — through prayer.

trophies.title: Watchman on Fire
trophies.text: I have posted watchmen on your walls; they will never be silent.
trophies.description: You are Heaven’s eyes on earth. You don't just pray — you guard gates.

trophies.title: Anointed Flame
trophies.text: I have been anointed with fresh oil.
trophies.description: You burn with fresh fire. The Spirit has marked your altar.

trophies.title: Voice of Thunder
trophies.text: I heard a voice from heaven like the roar of rushing waters and thunder.
trophies.description: Your voice shakes dimensions. Prayer has become power.

trophies.title: Refiner’s Vessel
trophies.text: He will sit as a refiner and purifier of silver.
trophies.description: Prayer has purified you. You're carrying the fire of holiness.

trophies.title: Holy Blaze
trophies.text: They saw what seemed to be tongues of fire that separated and came to rest on each of them.
trophies.description: You’ve become a living Pentecost. Heaven’s flame rests on you.

trophies.title: Burning Intercessor
trophies.text: The Spirit Himself intercedes for us through wordless groans.
trophies.description: You’re now partnering with the Spirit. You don’t pray alone anymore.

trophies.title: Temple Flame
trophies.text: Don’t you know that you yourselves are God’s temple and that God’s Spirit dwells in you?
trophies.description: You are the altar now. Prayer isn’t just what you do — it’s who you are.

trophies.title: Prophetic Fire
trophies.text: His word is in my heart like a fire, a fire shut up in my bones.
trophies.description: You speak with flame. You pray with fire. Your words are a sword.

trophies.title: Altar of Nations
trophies.text: My house will be called a house of prayer for all nations.
trophies.description: Your altar isn’t small anymore. You’re praying on behalf of nations.

trophies.title: Living Sacrifice
trophies.text: Offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God.
trophies.description: You’ve become the offering. A living altar. A minister of the eternal flame.
